page.title: 11Religion and Worship.
page.content: {SERVICE ATTENDANCE From our questionnaires we have found that from the hundred returned surveys people from{60}households attend religious services in local churches weekly,{17 }monthly,{85}occasionally and {15}never. {RELIGIOUS DENOMINATION} We found out from our survey that{42} households are Methodist,{48}C of E,{2 Roman Catholic and {7}Baptist. {30} children attend Sunday School. {WHICH CHURCH/CHAPEL We discovered which Church or Chapel people attend. Our results were{18}go to St. Lukes C.E. Church,{25}attend Snailbeach Methodist Chapel,{7}attend Lord's Hill Baptist Church,{18}attend Perkins Beach Methodist{Chapel.2}go to Minsterley C.E.,{1}Marsh Church, White Grit,{2}to Minsterley Parish Church and {1}to Kingdom Hall, Welshpool.
